relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
There is a good campus security staff on hand to prevent problems, but don't leave your belongings uunattended. You've been warned.
There are dozens of clubs, activities and sports teams.
The cafeteria can be loaded with sketchy characters during the lunch rush.
You can't beat the tuition costs.
Sorry but I'm here to study, not for fun.
There is a cafeteria on the 3rd floor of the S building. the food ther is a little pricey and can be unhealthy to eat every day.
There are no dorms on campus.
Some of the moe challenging classes can have very time-consuming workloads.
Register early for classes in ordeer to get the class days and times you desire.
MATC is an educational gem in the Milwaukee area. Tuition is quite economically priced. Overall it's a great school.

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot YES I AM! Login to rate or flag the reviews Stefani from Hales Corners, WI 03/28/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 44 Categories Comments Campus Safety There's security patrolling daily. Greek Life None that I know of. Great for these types of students Students who want to take cheap classes to transition into the college lifestyle. Also, if you don't know what you want to major in, general studies is cheaper than most places. Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus None that I know of. What to do for fun There's sports you could join or clubs. Food and Dining Haven't bought
